title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the separates variables

1 point is earned for the antiderivatives

1 point is earned for the constant of integration

1 point is earned for uses initial condition

1 point is earned for solves for y

dy dx =− 2x y ydy=−2xdx y 2 2 =− x 2 +C 1 2 =−1+C;C= 3 2 y 2 =−2 x 2 +3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWcaa qaaiaadsgacaWG5baabaGaamizaiaadIhaaaGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0Ya aSaaaeaacaaIYaGaamiEaaqaaiaadMhaaaaabaGaamyEaiaadsgaca WG5bGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaadIhacaWGKbGaamiEaaqaamaa laaabaGaamyEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaOqaaiaaikdaaaGaey ypa0JaeyOeI0IaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaa doeaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaIYaaaaiabg2da9iabgkHiTi aaigdacqGHRaWkcaWGdbGaai4oaiaadoeacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaa iodaaeaacaaIYaaaaaqaaiaadMhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccq GH9aqpcqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiab gUcaRiaaiodaaaaa@617C@
